support.faq1Q: How do I request a payout?
support.faq1A: Navigate to the Payouts section and click "Request Payout". Fill in the required details and submit.
support.faq2A: Our standard rules include 5% daily drawdown, 10% overall drawdown, and 4 minimum trading days.
support.faq3A: Payouts are processed within 24-48 hours after approval. Bank transfers may take additional 2-5 business days.
support.faq4Q: Can I trade during news events?
support.faq4A: Yes, news trading is allowed on all challenge types. There are no restrictions on trading during high-impact news.

ruleCompliance.newsTradingDesc: Trading during high-impact news events is allowed
ruleCompliance.newsTradingDetails: You can trade during NFP, FOMC, and other high-impact news events.
ruleCompliance.weekendHoldingDesc: Holding positions over the weekend is allowed
ruleCompliance.weekendHoldingDetails: Positions can be held from Friday close to Monday open without penalty.
ruleCompliance.expertAdvisorsDesc: Automated trading using EAs is allowed
ruleCompliance.expertAdvisorsDetails: You can use EAs, but martingale and grid strategies are monitored.
ruleCompliance.hedgingDesc: Opening opposite positions on the same instrument is allowed
ruleCompliance.hedgingDetails: Full hedging is permitted on all instruments.
ruleCompliance.copyTradingDesc: Copying trades from other traders is not allowed
ruleCompliance.copyTradingDetails: Each trader must execute their own trading strategy independently.
ruleCompliance.latencyArbitrageDesc: Exploiting price latency between brokers is prohibited
ruleCompliance.latencyArbitrageDetails: Using price feed delays for arbitrage will result in account termination.
ruleCompliance.noComplianceHistoryDesc: Compliance history will appear here once you start trading.
ruleCompliance.info1: Daily drawdown is calculated from the previous day's closing balance
ruleCompliance.info2: Overall drawdown is calculated from your account's highest balance (equity high-water mark)
ruleCompliance.info3: Breaking any hard rule will result in immediate account failure
ruleCompliance.info4: Soft breaches (warnings) are monitored but don't cause immediate failure
ruleCompliance.info5: All rule calculations are performed in real-time during market hours

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our challenges and platform.
faq.supportDescription: Our support team is here to help you 24/7.

whatIsPropCapitals.a: Prop Capitals is a proprietary trading firm that provides traders with funded accounts to trade our capital. Pass our evaluation and keep up to 90% of the profits you generate. You risk nothing of your own money when trading our funded accounts.

howToStartChallenge.q: How do I start a challenge?
howToStartChallenge.a: Simply choose your preferred account size and evaluation type on our Challenges page, complete the payment, and you'll receive your trading credentials within minutes. You can start trading immediately after receiving your credentials.

tradingPlatforms.q: What trading platforms do you support?
tradingPlatforms.a: We support MetaTrader 4 (MT4), MetaTrader 5 (MT5), cTrader, and DXTrade. You can choose your preferred platform when setting up your account.

credentialsTiming.q: How quickly do I get my credentials?
credentialsTiming.a: Trading credentials are typically delivered within 5 minutes of payment confirmation. You'll receive an email with your login details including server, account number, and password.

profitTarget.a: For the 2-Phase evaluation: Phase 1 requires 8% profit, Phase 2 requires 5% profit. For 1-Phase evaluation, the target is 10%. Instant Funding has no profit target for the challenge phase.

drawdownRules.a: Daily drawdown is limited to 5% of the starting balance of the day. Overall drawdown is limited to 10% from your highest achieved balance (trailing). These are the only drawdown rules you need to follow.

timeLimit.q: Is there a time limit to complete the challenge?
timeLimit.a: No, there is no maximum time limit. You can take as long as you need to reach the profit target. However, there is a minimum of 4 trading days required to pass each phase.

newsTrading.q: Can I trade during news events?
newsTrading.a: Yes, news trading is allowed on all our challenges. You can trade during high-impact news events without any restrictions or penalties.

weekendHolding.q: Can I hold trades over the weekend?
weekendHolding.a: Yes, you are allowed to hold positions over the weekend. There are no restrictions on overnight or weekend holding on any of our challenge types.

expertAdvisors.a: Yes, you can use Expert Advisors and automated trading systems. However, they must not exploit platform vulnerabilities or engage in practices like latency arbitrage or tick scalping.

whatHappensIfViolate.q: What happens if I violate a rule?
whatHappensIfViolate.a: If you violate a hard rule (daily or overall drawdown limit), your account will be automatically disabled. You'll receive a detailed email explaining the violation. You can then purchase a reset or start a new challenge.

freeRetry.q: Can I get a free retry?
freeRetry.a: Yes! If you achieve 8% profit on your challenge before failing, you qualify for a free retry. This gives you another chance without paying again.

resetAccount.a: Yes, you can purchase a reset at a discounted price if you fail the challenge. This gives you a fresh start with the same account size. Reset prices vary based on account size.

tradingDay.q: What counts as a trading day?
tradingDay.a: A trading day is any day where you have at least one trade open for more than 2 minutes. You need a minimum of 4 trading days to pass each phase.

profitSplit.a: The profit split starts at 80% for smaller accounts and can go up to 90% for larger accounts and through our scaling program. As you prove consistency, your profit split percentage increases.

payoutFrequency.q: How often can I request a payout?
payoutFrequency.a: Payouts are processed bi-weekly. You can request a payout every 14 days once you have profits to withdraw. Your first payout is available 14 days after receiving your funded account.

paymentMethods.q: What payment methods are available for payouts?
paymentMethods.a: We support bank wire transfers, cryptocurrency (BTC, ETH, USDT), PayPal, and Wise transfers. All payout methods have zero fees.

minimumPayout.q: Is there a minimum payout amount?
minimumPayout.a: The minimum payout amount is $50. There is no maximum limit on withdrawals - you can withdraw all your profits if you wish.

payoutProcessing.q: How long do payouts take to process?
payoutProcessing.a: Payouts are typically processed within 24-48 business hours after approval. Bank transfers may take an additional 2-5 business days to arrive in your account.

howScalingWorks.q: How does the scaling plan work?
howScalingWorks.a: Every time you achieve 10% profit on your funded account and complete 2 payout cycles, your account size increases by 25%. You can scale up to a maximum of $2,000,000 in trading capital.

profitSplitScaling.q: What happens to my profit split when I scale?
profitSplitScaling.a: Your profit split increases as you scale. Starting at 80%, it can reach up to 90% at higher levels of the scaling plan. Each scale level brings you closer to the maximum profit split.

scalingConditions.q: Are there any conditions for scaling?
scalingConditions.a: To qualify for scaling, you must achieve at least 10% profit, complete at least 2 payout cycles, and maintain good risk management practices throughout the evaluation period.

refund.a: Refunds are available within 14 days of purchase if you haven't placed any trades. Once trading activity begins, refunds are no longer available as the evaluation has started.

multipleAccounts.a: Yes, you can have multiple challenge or funded accounts simultaneously. However, you cannot use the same trading strategy via copy trades between your different accounts.

weekendAccount.q: What happens to my account during weekends?
weekendAccount.a: Your account remains active during weekends. You can hold positions over weekends and your drawdown calculations continue as normal. The market is closed but your account is still monitored.

contactSupport.a: You can reach our support team 24/7 through live chat on our website, email at support@the-bluehaven.com, or through the support ticket system in your dashboard.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question? We're here to help. Reach out and we'll respond as quickly as possible.

dailyDrawdown.title: Daily Drawdown (5%)
dailyDrawdown.description: The maximum you can lose in a single day, calculated from the day's starting balance. Resets at midnight server time.
dailyDrawdown.exampleText: With a $50,000 balance, your daily loss limit is $2,500.

maximumDrawdown.title: Maximum Drawdown (10%)
maximumDrawdown.description: The maximum total drawdown from your highest achieved balance. This is a trailing drawdown that follows your highest equity.
maximumDrawdown.exampleText: If your highest balance was $55,000, your max drawdown level is $49,500.

cta.subtitle: Now that you understand the rules, choose your challenge and begin your funded trading journey.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Prop Capitals's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

description.title: 2. Description of Services
description.content: Prop Capitals provides proprietary trading evaluation programs ("Challenges") that allow traders to demonstrate their trading skills. Successful completion of a Challenge may result in access to a funded trading account.

eligibility.title: 3. Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services. By using Prop Capitals, you represent that you have the legal capacity to enter into this agreement.

accountRegistration.title: 4. Account Registration
accountRegistration.content: You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

tradingRules.title: 5. Trading Rules
tradingRules.content: All traders must adhere to the trading rules specified for their Challenge type. Violation of these rules may result in account termination without refund.

prohibitedActivities.title: 6. Prohibited Activities
items: Exploiting platform vulnerabilities or bugs
Using third-party account management without disclosure
Engaging in arbitrage trading between different brokers
Copy trading from accounts at different prop firms
Any form of market manipulation

refundPolicy.title: 7. Refund Policy
refundPolicy.content: Refunds are available within 14 days of purchase if no trades have been placed. Once trading activity begins, no refunds will be issued.

payouts.title: 8. Payouts
payouts.content: Funded traders are eligible for bi-weekly profit withdrawals according to their profit split agreement. Prop Capitals reserves the right to verify all trading activity before processing payouts.

intellectualProperty.title: 9. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, trademarks, and intellectual property on Prop Capitals's platform are owned by Prop Capitals and protected by applicable laws.

limitationOfLiability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: Prop Capitals shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

modifications.title: 11. Modifications
modifications.content: Prop Capitals reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services after modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: 12. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, please contact us at support@the-bluehaven.com

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us:
items: Personal identification information (name, email, phone number)
Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)
Trading account data and activity
Communication records with our support team
KYC documentation (ID, proof of address)

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: To provide and maintain our services
To process transactions and send related information
To monitor trading activity and enforce our rules
To communicate with you about updates and promotions
To detect and prevent fraud

dataSecurity.title: 3. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. This includes encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We may share your information with:
items: Trading platform providers (MT4, MT5, cTrader, DXTrade)
Payment processors for transaction handling
KYC verification services
Legal authorities when required by law

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access your personal data
Request correction of inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data (subject to legal requirements)
Opt-out of marketing communications
Request data portability

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and personalize content. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. We may retain certain information for legal compliance and dispute resolution.

internationalTransfers.title: 8. International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

childrensPrivacy.title: 9. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

contactUs.title: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact our Data Protection Officer at support@the-bluehaven.com
